Name: Naos sistrum with Hathor head
Description: The upper part and the handle of this naos sistrum with Hathor head are missing. The preserved part of the naos shows two holes for rattle staves at the top. In the shrine, a uraeus and a Hathor head with a striated wig and a broad ornate collar are depicted. There are also uraei on both sides of the head. A very shallow torus moulding marks the underside of the naos.
